options.label: England
options.msg: She had a great times in England, but she is not British.

options.label: Mexico
options.msg: She likes tacos. If you have a favor to ask of her, take her to a Mexican restaurant.

options.label: Thailand
options.msg: Thai food is one of her favorites, but she is not Thai.

source.label: Where is the source of her beauty?

options.label: Eyes
options.msg: I agree. She has beautiful eyes, but there is a better answer.

options.label: Nose
options.msg: Her sharp nose? You are getting warmer!

options.label: Mouth
options.msg: Almost there! Have you seen her beautiful smile? You should see.

animal.label: What animal character is on her birthday cake?

options.label: Elephant
options.msg: Are you supporting Donald Tru... nevermind.

options.label: Donkey
options.msg: Donkey Kong[c] is a 1981 arcade video game developed and published by Nintendo.
